Bioengineering Day Committee

Jessica Lam Swetha Prabhakaran
Meeting Times: Mondays, 6:30pm in PFBH

About

Bioengineering day gives a chance for seniors to showcase their projects, graduate students to present their work, speakers to share insights in their respective fields, and for graduate and undergraduates alike to test their smarts at the Quiz Bowl. With this cherished tradition we will work as a team with graduate students to create a day dedicated to you.

BE Day
